settings.title: Flood Lights
settings.content: Cut energy and maintenance costs with new commercial-grade LED flood light fixtures. From mini fixtures to stadium-sized lighting, no matter how big or small your outdoor flood lighting needs, we have them covered.

settings.html:
High Power Flood Lights & Stadium LED Lights

When "bright" isn't bright enough. Our stadium-style LED floodlights put out up to 180,000 lumens of light at a significantly lower cost-per-hour to run than traditional high-power lighting.

More:

settings.title: Need Poles?
settings.content: If you'll need poles, including high mast poles, for your new high-power LED flood lights, check out our steel and aluminum pole options—and request a quote for your project today.

settings.html:
High Power, High Mast Flood Lights and LED Stadium Lights for Sale

Looking for a brilliant and energy-efficient way to light up large outdoor areas? Look no further than our high power flood lights and stadium LED lighting! Our high-lumen LED flood lights are perfect for a variety of applications, including sports stadiums, outdoor concert venues, race tracks, football and soccer fields, large parking lots, interstate street and construction lighting, quarries, and more. Find the perfect LED light for your needs.

ELEDLights' high power LED flood lights are built with high-quality materials and made to last. They are also highly energy efficient and long-lasting, saving your organization significant energy and maintenance costs compared to high pressure sodium, mercury vapor, and metal halide. And we offer a satisfaction guarantee on all of our LED lights, so you can be sure that you are getting a quality product.

Shop the stadium LED lights and high power flood lights we have on sale, and find the ideal solution for your large-scale outdoor lighting requirements today.

Need help planning the lighting for your stadium, parking lot, or other high-mast application? Get in touch with our team to access the free professional lighting assistance we offer to customers who source their lights through us.
